name: COVID19SNOMEDValueSetForCOVID19LabTests
title: COVID19 SNOMED Value Set for COVID19 Lab Tests
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to SARS-CoV-2 labs.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes SARS-CoV-2 antigen, antibody, and organisms detection.),(Exclusion Criteria: )
